title: [Silver and Aquamarine]
description: Low stone walls along the street's edges break intermittently, giving way to the pebble paths which sprawl among thatched bungalows and earthy wooden cottages on either side of you.  Beds of sweetgrass and herbs spread between wall and path, their pungent scents wafting away on lazy puffs of air.
paths: Obvious paths: north, east, south, west
